scripts.build: cpx "node_modules/sirsluginston-sharedui/SharedUI/**/*" SirSluginston-SharedUI && cpx "node_modules/sirsluginston-sharedui/*.css" SirSluginston-SharedUI && npm run scaffold:sso
scripts.scaffold:sso: node scaffold-sso.js --title "SirSluginston Co" --tagline "Single Sign-On" --logo SirSluginston-SharedUI/Assets/Images/SirSluginston_Logo_Original.JPG --color #4B3A78 --footer "Debonair Gastropod Genius" --copyright "Â© 2025 SirSluginston"
